name: Electric Sheep (SEGARIO)
description:
Welcome to Mars !

Here we are, trying to breed sheeps in our latest pen and send them to earth. 

Unfortunately these poor earthlings don't have any natural sheep left alive...so we, generous Martians, are sending them some. 

But be careful ! Infected sheep may harm your flock's production, so eliminate them and expand your flock.

                              Team :                     Install instructions :

Once the file is downloaded, open "Electric_Sheep" and become the best sheep farmer of the entire space !
